languages.text: {n}Префект задумчиво пожевывает губы.{/n} "Скажу со всей прямотой, Ваша Светлость, исход инспекции Тассеры далек от удовлетворительного. Мелкие беспорядки, будь то массовая казнь мутантов или бунт черни под видом местных игрищ, не так опасны, как вызванный вашим вмешательством, с позволения сказать, государственный переворот. Понимаю, последствия — то, что власть имущие привыкают перепоручать своим слугам... и в силу этого игнорировать". {n}Сверкнув окулярами, Инскрибия поднимает глаза от свитков.{/n} "Однако, надеюсь, мои слова помогут вам пересмотреть свой подход к отправлению воли Империума в Просторе Коронус". {n}Щелкнув ногтем по сервочерепу, старуха отсылает его прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Решение об обоснованности действий названного субъекта в ходе расследования дела о десятине с мира "Тассера" откладывается до полного рассмотрения материалов дела в дату, которая будет назначена согласно протоколу PR-47558-15. Конец записи". {n}Щелкнув единственным уцелевшим ногтем по сервочерепу, старуха отсылает его прочь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект задумчиво пожевывает губы.{/n} "Скажу со всей прямотой, Ваша Светлость, исход инспекции Тассеры далек от удовлетворительного. Мелкие беспорядки, будь то массовая казнь мутантов или бунт черни под видом местных игрищ, не так опасны, как вызванный вашим вмешательством, с позволения сказать, государственный переворот. Понимаю, последствия — то, что власть имущие привыкают перепоручать своим слугам... и в силу этого игнорировать". {n}Сверкнув окулярами, Инскрибия поднимает глаза от свитков.{/n} "Однако, надеюсь, мои слова помогут вам пересмотреть свой подход к отправлению воли Империума в Просторе Коронус". {n}Щелкнув ногтем по сервочерепу, старуха отсылает его прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you permit my choice of words — coup, that was caused by your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words can help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総監は考え込むように唇を噛んだ。{/n}「閣下、率直に申し上げます。惑星タッセーラの視察に関して導き出された結論は、決して満足のいくものではありませんでした。変異体の大量処刑や、祝祭を装った下層民の陰謀といった小さな騒動などは…この言葉をお許しいただけるなら、あなたの介入によって引き起こされたクーデターほど危険ではありません。権力を授かった方はご自分の行動の後始末を臣下に任せるものです…だから無視しても構わないものと見なしているのでしょう」{n}インスクリビアが巻物から目を上げると、その眼鏡がきらりと光った。{/n}「ですが、今後コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいて帝国の意志を実行なさる際のご判断に、私の言葉が何らかの見直しを促すことになれば幸いです」{n}彼女は爪で軽く叩いて、サーヴォスカルを退けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は考え込むように唇を噛んだ。{/n}「閣下、率直に申し上げます。惑星タッセーラの視察に関して導き出された結論は、決して満足のいくものではありませんでした。変異体の大量処刑や、祝祭を装った下層民の陰謀といった小さな騒動などは…この言葉をお許しいただけるなら、あなたの介入によって引き起こされたクーデターほど危険ではありません。権力を授かった方はご自分の行動の後始末を臣下に任せるものです…だから無視しても構わないものと見なしているのでしょう」{n}インスクリビアが巻物から目を上げると、その眼鏡がきらりと光った。{/n}「ですが、今後コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいて帝国の意志を実行なさる際のご判断に、私の言葉が何らかの見直しを促すことになれば幸いです」{n}彼女は爪で軽く叩いて、サーヴォスカルを退けた。{/n}
{n}総監は考え込むように唇を噛んだ。{/n}「閣下、率直に申し上げます。惑星タッセーラの査察に関して導き出された結論は、決して満足のいくものではありませんでした。今後、コロヌス・エクスパンスで帝国の意志を遂行する際の方針を見直す助けとなれば幸いです」{n}彼女は爪で軽く叩いてサーヴォスカルを解放した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin kaut gedankenverloren auf ihrer Lippe.{/n} "Ich will ehrlich zu Euch sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}: Die Schlussfolgerungen, die hinsichtlich der Inspektion von Thassera gezogen wurden, waren alles andere als zufriedenstellend. Unbedeutende Störungen wie die Massenexekution von Mutanten oder die als Feierlichkeit getarnte Intrige des Pöbels sind nicht annähernd so gefährlich wie der – bitte gestattet mir die Wortwahl – Putsch, der aus Eurem Eingreifen resultierte. Ich verstehe, dass Konsequenzen etwas sind, was die Mächtigen nur allzu gerne ihren Dienern überlassen ... und es deshalb als akzeptabel erachten, sie zu ignorieren." {n}Inscribias Okularlinsen funkeln, als sie von ihren Schriftrollen aufblickt.{/n} Allerdings hoffe ich, dass Euch meine Worte helfen werden, Euren Ansatz zu überdenken und den Willen des Imperiums in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zukünftig umzusetzen." {n}Sie tippt den Servoschädel mit ihrem Nagel an, um ihn zu entlassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

Unbedeutende Störungen wie die Massenexekution von Mutanten oder die als Feierlichkeit getarnte Intrige des Pöbels sind nicht annähernd so gefährlich wie der – bitte gestattet mir die Wortwahl – Putsch, der aus Eurem Eingreifen resultierte. Ich verstehe, dass Konsequenzen etwas sind, was die Mächtigen nur allzu gerne ihren Dienern überlassen ... und es deshalb als akzeptabel erachten, sie zu ignorieren." {n}Inscribias Okularlinsen funkeln, als sie von ihren Schriftrollen aufblickt.{/n} Allerdings hoffe ich, dass Euch meine Worte helfen werden, Euren Ansatz zu überdenken und den Willen des Imperiums in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zukünftig umzusetzen." {n}Sie tippt den Servoschädel mit ihrem Nagel an, um ihn zu entlassen.{/n}

{n}Die Präfektin kaut gedankenverloren auf ihrer Lippe.{/n} "Ich will ehrlich zu Euch sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}: Die Schlussfolgerungen, die hinsichtlich der Inspektion von Thassera gezogen wurden, waren alles andere als zufriedenstellend. Ich hoffe, meine Worte werden Euch helfen, Euren Ansatz zu überdenken und den Willen des Imperiums in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zukünftig umzusetzen." {n}Sie tippt den Servoschädel mit ihrem Nagel an, um ihn zu entlassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète se mordille les lèvres, perdue dans ses pensées.{/n} « Je vais être franche avec vous, Votre Seigneurie : les conclusions établies à l'issue de l'inspection de Thassera sont loin d'être satisfaisantes. Des troubles mineurs tels qu'une exécution massive de mutants ou un complot de la populace maquillé en fête sont bien moins dangereux que, permettez-moi l'expression, ce "coup d'État" découlant de votre intervention. Je comprends que les détenteurs du pouvoir ont l'habitude de laisser le soin à leurs serviteurs d'assumer les conséquences de leurs actes... et qu'ils jugent donc totalement acceptable de les ignorer. {n}Les lorgnons mécaniques d'Inscribia s'illuminent tandis qu'elle relève la tête.{/n} Cependant, j'espère que mon travail vous permettra à l'avenir d'adapter votre méthode d'application de la Volonté de l'Imperium au sein des Étendues de Koronus. » {n}Elle congédie le servocrâne d'une pichenette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

Des troubles mineurs tels qu'une exécution massive de mutants ou un complot de la populace maquillé en fête sont bien moins dangereux que, permettez-moi l'expression, ce "coup d'État" découlant de votre intervention. {n}La préfète se mordille les lèvres, perdue dans ses pensées.{/n} « Je vais être franche avec vous, Votre Seigneurie : les conclusions établies à l'issue de l'inspection de Thassera sont loin d'être satisfaisantes. J'espère que mon travail vous permettra à l'avenir d'adapter votre méthode d'application de la Volonté de l'Imperium au sein des Étendues de Koronus. » {n}Elle congédie le servocrâne d'une pichenette.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta se muerde el labio, pensativa.{/n} «Le seré sincera, mi{mf|lord|lady}: las conclusiones obtenidas durante la inspección de Thassera distan mucho de ser satisfactorias. Un percance menor como la ejecución en masa de mutantes o la conspiración de la plebe disfrazada de festividad no resulta ni de lejos tan peligroso como lo ha sido, si me permite la expresión, el desgobierno propiciado por su intervención. Me hago cargo de que los poderosos tienden a relegar en sus siervos las consecuencias de sus actos, y por tanto ha considerado aceptable ignorarlas». {n}Las lentes oculares de Inscribia centellean al consultar sus pergaminos.{/n} «No obstante, espero que mis palabras le ayuden a reevaluar su enfoque al ejecutar la voluntad del Imperium en la Extensión de Koronus». {n}Con un toque de su uña, despide al servocráneo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

Un percance menor como la ejecución en masa de mutantes o la conspiración de la plebe disfrazada de festividad no resulta ni de lejos tan peligroso como lo ha sido, si me permite la expresión, el desgobierno propiciado por su intervención. Me hago cargo de que los poderosos tienden a relegar en sus siervos las consecuencias de sus actos, y por tanto ha considerado aceptable ignorarlas». {n}Las lentes oculares de Inscribia centellean al consultar sus pergaminos.{/n} «No obstante, espero que mis palabras le ayuden a reevaluar su enfoque al ejecutar la voluntad del Imperium en la Extensión de Koronus». {n}Con un toque de su uña, despide al servocráneo.{/n}

{n}La prefecta se muerde el labio, pensativa.{/n} «Le seré sincera, mi{mf|lord|lady}: las conclusiones obtenidas durante la inspección de Thassera distan mucho de ser satisfactorias. Espero que mis palabras le ayuden a reevaluar su enfoque al ejecutar la voluntad del Imperium en la Extensión de Koronus». {n}Con un toque de su uña, despide al servocráneo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行政官咬着嘴唇沉思着，之后开了口。{/n}“请允许我坦率地告诉您，大人。根据您在塔瑟拉视察期间的行为，我们得出的结论恐怕远远无法令人满意。无论是大规模处决变种人，还是包藏祸心的庆典骚乱，其危险程度远不及在您的干预之下发动的政变，请允许我使用这个词。我能理解，那些掌握权力的人做完决定之后，往往会让他们的仆人来面对接下来的后果……他们认为这样的事情不需要他们亲自关注。”{n}缮师从文书中抬起了头，镜片闪着白光。{/n}“话虽如此，希望我的话能为您带来启发。希望您以后在科罗努斯扩区行使帝国意志的时候，能考虑得更加周全。”{n}她轻敲了一下指甲，示意伺服头骨离开。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

{n}行政官咬着嘴唇沉思着，之后开了口。{/n}“请允许我坦率地告诉您，大人。根据您在塔瑟拉视察期间的行为，我们得出的结论恐怕远远无法令人满意。希望我的话能为您带来启发，当您以后在科罗努斯扩区行使帝国意志的时候，能考虑得更加周全。”{n}她轻敲一下指甲，示意伺服头骨离开。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, düşünceli bir şekilde dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Açık konuşacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Thassera denetimi hususunda varılan sonuçlar hiç de tatmin edici olmadı. Mutantların toplu infazı ya da ayaktakımının kutlamayla kılıf tutturduğu komplosu gibi küçük karışıklıklar, müdahaleniz sonucunda ortaya çıkan darbe kadar tehlikeli değil. Anladığım kadarıyla sonuçlar, güç sahiplerinin başa çıkmayı hizmetkârlarına bırakmaya alışkın oldukları bir şey... Bu nedenle sonuçları görmezden gelmeyi kabul edilebilir buluyorlar." {n}İnscribia başını parşömenden kaldırdığı sırada oküler mercekleri parlıyor.{/n} "Umarım sözlerim, gelecekte Koronus Enginliği'nde İmparatorluk iradesini sağlama konusundaki yaklaşımınızı gözden geçirmenize yardımcı olur." {n}Tırnağıyla hafifçe vurarak hizmeleti gönderiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect chews on her lip in thought.{/n} "I will be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}: the conclusions that were drawn regarding the Thassera inspection were far from satisfactory. Minor disturbances such as a mass execution of mutants or the rabble's plot disguised as a celebration are not nearly as dangerous as the — if you will permit my choice of words — coup that resulted from your intervention. I understand that consequences are something that those endowed with power are wont to leave to their servants to deal with... and therefore, something they find acceptable to ignore." {n}Inscribia's ocular lenses flash as she looks up from her scrolls.{/n} "However, I hope my words may help you to revise your approach to executing the Imperium's will in the Koronus Expanse in future." {n}With a tap of her nail, she dismisses the servo-skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt, düşünceli bir şekilde dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Açık konuşacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Thassera denetimi hususunda varılan sonuçlar hiç de tatmin edici olmadı. Mutantların toplu infazı ya da ayaktakımının kutlamayla kılıf tutturduğu komplosu gibi küçük karışıklıklar, müdahaleniz sonucunda ortaya çıkan darbe kadar tehlikeli değil. Anladığım kadarıyla sonuçlar, güç sahiplerinin başa çıkmayı hizmetkârlarına bırakmaya alışkın oldukları bir şey... Bu nedenle sonuçları görmezden gelmeyi kabul edilebilir buluyorlar." {n}İnscribia başını parşömenden kaldırdığı sırada oküler mercekleri parlıyor.{/n} "Umarım sözlerim, gelecekte Koronus Enginliği'nde İmparatorluk iradesini sağlama konusundaki yaklaşımınızı gözden geçirmenize yardımcı olur." {n}Tırnağıyla hafifçe vurarak hizmeleti gönderiyor.{/n}
